thread.title: LPs Move to Curb Sexual Harassment in VC Industry

author: Cat Zakrzewski
title: LPs Move to Curb Sexual Harassment in VC Industry
text:
Limited partners face growing pressure to play a bigger role in policing the venture industry following a wave of sexual harassment scandals in Silicon Valley.
Pension funds, endowments, family offices and other LPs have been seeking ways—before they write new checks—to stay ahead of sexual misconduct by doing more rigorous due diligence. Their leading trade group, the Institutional Limited Partners Association, is working with its lawyers to craft guidelines by June that could help investors identify bad actors before they...
